title: History
text: This theme includes references to history in both Portugal and the participants' associated country of heritage.

title: Gentrification
text: This theme discusses frustrations and issues surrounding gentrification in Lisbon, such as cost of living, and changes to the visual environment of the city.

title: Gender
text: This theme refers to the celebration of women's strength and advocacy throughout culture and history.

title: Reflective Places
text: This theme relates to places in Lisbon that have visually inspired participants and encouraged them to engage in introspective moments.

title: Social Spaces
text: This theme relates to spaces in Lisbon that allow for public gatherings and celebrative practices.

title: Transport
text: This theme relates to the experience of travelling around Lisbon, also briefly touching on the economic issues and implications surrounding the use of transport in the city.

title: Education
text: This theme relates to participant's current or past experiences of attending higher education in Lisbon.

title: Life and Memories
text: This theme relates to the life experiences, memories and nostalgia often associated with particular places in Lisbon.

title: Nature
text: This theme relates to open and natural spaces and participants' thoughts evoked by these spaces.
